message.body: Arabella! I'm so glad that I will see you in just about a week! I will be in NYC part of Friday and Saturday with the study group! I can't wait!!!
I just saw the email!!!! And thought the same
Can't wait to see you, so glad you're coming up
I'll be there friday- Sunday mostly as well
Yah yah!!! I'm feeling very first day of school about the study group! Excited to see everyone!!! How is Tri state????
I'm not sure how long I will be there. I'm bringing a friend for a friday night treatment and promised to be his bird wing and fly him home if needed. We will see!!
Its kicking my butt, but its been really great so far. Its a solid school w good teachers
Yes, both my roomies r getting a TX as well.
How does Laura fit so many people in? She's my hero.
Yeah. I really like marks work alot. R u reading acupuncture imaging?

I am supposed to be! Lol I just finished a new American Acu. I was feeling poor and didn't but all the books so I inter library loaned then a few had to be sent back before I got to them. Do you recommend the imaging book?
Yeah, its small and is amazing
Thank you for convincing me to buy it!!! There are so many hidden little costs to school. It adds up quick.
Word. I can lend if from.my library too, we got a longggg lending policy
Do u have the dead man app?

I don't have the deadman app. I keep coming close to buying it. I just got an iPhone and a MacBook so I am still learning about apps! My classmates with iPads have it and love it. Tho I think it doesn't have everything the book has in terms of description
Yeah, its a point summary with no other text. Daddy just got his first MacBook and iPad, so I'm excited...yay, so psyched yr coming!
Look at us pimping our apple products!!
I just looked up Acu Imaging and bought it. Dude, it's only $12. I'm laughing at myself...
It'll make u.insane these books...
Did you know you get 6 months free of amazon prime as a student? I just cashed it in and now am on an amazon spree. You can buy lightbulbs!!! Haha
Yeah!!! I did the same...hahaha
I was starting to have stacks of random books and just couldn't bear that. I thought I wouldn't like Mark Seem but he's awesome.
Watch out! I keep buying weird girls stuff like mango shampoo!! Omg.
Yeah. Also check out biodigitalhuman.com, its a free 3d anatomy program
I bought 3 bras that fit perfectly
What! Are they all the same bra but different colors? I have like 18 bras that try to kill me or that look weird.
You know it. Hanes MY way
That is totally rad. And completely inspiring.
5 days!!I'm counting :)
Four days!!! Are we gonna make it! I'm ready to go!!!!
No!!!
I just can't wait to be with the group!!!
I'm gonna die b4 I get there!;;;
Lets discuss the shallower side of life! What will we wear?
I feel like I will just be happy to make it there showered!! Haha! Busy until then.
Haha.white black. It gets hot on megs apt.
Friday is business casual till tx time! I might rock some colors!!!
Dooooo it. Gonna rock my fancy jeans
I got some jeans at old navy called the rock star! Size 2 muffin top!
Is there really no decent food around Meg's apartment? I'm gonna bring some stuff but am not sure how much I will manage to bring....
There's a deli, some Indian food,a decent diner. Subway, pizza...just not organic salads,etc.
Good to know! That all sounds fine. :)
